Summary: Triangle shape UFO with orange lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on the porch of a friend's home, 6 of us witnesses a bright light zig zagging whilst travelling East to West over Phelan. As the object traveled over head we could clearly see it was a Triangle shape with orange lights at each corner of the triangle and in the center of the triangle. The object made absolutely no noise. We watched it as it continued in a Westerly direction and out of site.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Phelan
There were no other sightings in Phelan on or around July 21st 2010
